item.title: Master Plumber (Level 10)
item.description: Use the internal plumbing commands of git.

item.title: Merchant (Level 5)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Archivist (Level 4)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Master Plumber (Level 9)
item.description: Use the internal plumbing commands of git.

item.title: Seamstress (Level 5)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Master Plumber (Level 8)
item.description: Use the internal plumbing commands of git.

item.title: Master Plumber (Level 7)
item.description: Use the internal plumbing commands of git.

item.title: Presenter (Level 6)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Gipsy (Level 5)
item.description: Create, list, delete a tag signed with GPG using git tag

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Worker (Level 2)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Apprentice Goldsmith (Level 3)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 3)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 2)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 1)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Miller (Level 5)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 130 times with git add -p.

item.title: Butcher (Level 5)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 7)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Master Historian (Level 8)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Blacksmith (Level 5)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Apprentice Goldsmith (Level 2)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.
